alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 10:58PM CDT until June 11 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN TEXAS...SOUTHEASTERN CIMARRON...NORTHWESTERN SHERMAN AND NORTHEASTERN DALLAM COUNTIES... At 1058 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles southwest of Griggs, or 17 miles southeast of Boise City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Stratford and Griggs. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
